> Alex wrote:
> 
> > Hi,
> >
> > Came across a bug =
in the constant definitions in the 
> st.ata.util.Alist 
> > interface If y=
ou look at the T_INPUTSTREAM and T_OBJECT 
> they both use 
> > the same in=
t values.  This is causing me to get a 
> ClassCastException.
> 
> Thanks A=
lex.  I defined T_OBJECT to be '7' and committed 
> change to HEAD.
> 
> I =
also committed first cut at features we discussed last week.  Now a 
> call=
 to checkpoint manages the pausing, actual checkpoint, 
> and resume if 
> =
crawler is in mid-flight when checkpointing is invoked  Also added 
> facil=
ity that will run a timer thread that will invoke 
> checkpointing on 
> a =
period if a period has been set in heritrix.properties (See user 
> manual =
for detail).  Finally, I made it so you can pass a 
> CrawlJobHandler to a =
Heritrix constructor.  Should take care 
> of the race 
> condition you rep=
orted last week.  But to use it you'll have to make 
> your own version of =
Heritrix.main.  If there is any refactoring of 
> Heritrix.main that would =
make your life easier, just send 
> over a patch.
> 
> Yours,
> St.Ack
>
